A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointed and has killed my interest and support(movies \, merchandise\, games etc) of new trilogy completely. The original characters deserved better.  If you haven't watched this\, don't. At least The Force Awakens had mystery\, and despite its flaws it had potential. How can you mess up Star Wars so bad?? These new movies are hollow and miss the heart and charm of what makes universe special. At least Rogue one was a worthy effort!
